text:
[Verse]
Morning light it breaks the dark
Wake up feeling fine
Chasing dreams in the park
World spins on a dime

[Verse 2]
Coffee steam in the air
Smiles all around
Laughter sweet everywhere
Love in every sound

[Chorus]
Sunshine eyes so bright
Lighting up my day
Every moment feels right
In your light we'll stay

[Verse 3]
Walking down city streets
Hand in hand we go
Rhythm of our hearts beats
In a perfect flow

[Verse 4]
Rain may fall but we shine
Through the stormy skies
Every cloud we redefine
With those sunshine eyes

[Chorus]
Sunshine eyes so bright
Lighting up my day
Every moment feels right
In your light we'll stay
title: Sunshine Eyes
